item.title: 独家：汇丰资产管理公司全球可持续发展主管即将离职
item.description: 汇丰银行（HSBC）周五表示，该行资产管理部门最高级别的可持续金融主管即将离职，这是汇丰银行在新任首席执行官领导下进行重组期间一系列离职人员中的最新一位。【原文：The top sustainable finance executive at HSBC's asset management division is leaving the firm, HSBC said on Friday, the latest in a series of departures from the bank amid a restructuring under its new chief executive.】

item.title: 刚果向 "星链 "公司颁发许可证，推翻了先前的禁令
item.description: 刚果民主共和国周五表示，该国已成为向科技亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的Starlink公司颁发许可证的最新一个非洲国家，该公司将很快开始运营。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo said on Friday it had become the latest African country to grant a licence to tech billionaire Elon Musk's Starlink and that the company would begin operations soon.】

item.title: 英国警告企业网络安全必须成为 "绝对优先事项
item.description: 在零售商玛莎百货（Marks & Spencer）、合作社集团（Co-op Group）和哈罗德百货（Harrods）遭到攻击后，英国政府将于下周警告所有英国公司将网络安全视为 "绝对优先事项"。【原文：The British government will next week warn all UK companies to treat cyber security as an "absolute priority" in the wake of attacks on retailers Marks & Spencer , the Co-op Group and Harrods.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果公司与初创公司 Anthropic 合作开发人工智能驱动的编码平台
item.description: 据彭博新闻社援引知情人士的话报道，苹果公司正在与亚马逊支持的初创公司 Anthropic 合作开发一个新的 "振动编码 "软件平台，该平台将利用人工智能代表程序员编写、编辑和测试代码。【原文：Apple is partnering with Amazon-backed startup Anthropic on a new "vibe-coding" software platform that will use artificial intelligence to write, edit, and test code on behalf of programmers, Bloomberg News reported, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国 FDA 接受诺和诺德关于口服减肥药 Wegovy 的申请
item.description: 丹麦制药商诺和诺德公司周五表示，美国食品和药物管理局已经接受了该公司减肥药Wegovy口服版的上市申请，并将在第四季度做出决定。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has accepted Novo Nordisk's marketing application for an oral version of its weight-loss drug Wegovy and will decide in the fourth quarter, the Danish drugmaker said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国将修订拜登时代的海上油气保税规则
item.description: 内政部周五表示，特朗普政府将修订拜登时代的一项规定，该规定要求石油和天然气行业提供近 70 亿美元的新资金保证，以支付旧基础设施的退役费用。【原文：The Trump administration will revise a Biden-era rule that required the oil and gas industry to provide nearly $7 billion in new financial assurances to cover the cost of decommissioning old infrastructure, the Interior Department said on Friday.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：北京权衡向美国提供芬太尼以启动贸易谈判
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五报道，中国政府正在考虑如何消除特朗普政府对中国在芬太尼贸易中所扮演角色的担忧，从而有可能为贸易谈判的启动提供一个摆脱敌对状态的渠道。【原文：Beijing is considering ways to address the Trump administration's concerns about China's role in the fentanyl trade, potentially providing an off-ramp from hostilities to allow trade talks to start, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday.】

item.title: 微笑飞行：巴西航空公司欢呼 Lady Gaga 带动的需求
item.description: 本周末，Lady Gaga 将在里约热内卢举行免费演唱会，预计将吸引 100 多万歌迷前往科帕卡巴纳海滩。【原文：Brazilian airlines are enjoying a boost as fans from all over the country fly to Rio de Janeiro ahead of a free Lady Gaga concert that is expected to draw more than 1 million fans to Copacabana Beach this weekend.】

item.title: 特朗普的预算包括为世界银行最贫穷国家基金拨款 32 亿美元
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五要求国会批准向世界银行国际开发协会（IDA）捐款 32 亿美元，该协会向世界上最贫穷的国家提供低息或零息贷款。【原文：President Donald Trump on Friday asked Congress to approve $3.2 billion in contributions to the World Bank's International Development Association (IDA), which provides low- or zero-interest loans to the world's poorest countries.】

item.title: 特朗普预算提议削减可再生能源、农场和环保局的开支
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府周五提议明年削减数十亿美元的联邦资金，用于可再生能源和电动汽车充电器等项目，并削减旨在遏制气候变化的项目。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration on Friday proposed cutting billions of dollars in federal funding next year for projects including renewable energy and electric vehicle chargers, and gutting programs aimed at curbing climate change.】

item.title: LVMH 集团的酩悦-轩尼诗复兴计划寄希望于大品牌
item.description: 路威酩轩集团首席执行官让-雅克-吉奥尼（Jean-Jacques Guiony）本周在路透社播放的一段视频中告诉员工，路威酩轩集团将专注于其最大、最知名的酒类品牌，并抑制小品牌的国际野心，以重振酩悦轩尼诗。【原文：LVMH will focus on its biggest, best known alcohol brands and rein in international ambitions for smaller labels to revive Moet Hennessy, the division's CEO Jean-Jacques Guiony told employees this week in a video reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 特朗普关税令伦敦 IPO 偏离轨道，申万放弃英国通信公司
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周五证实，在线快速时尚零售商Shein已经放弃了Brunswick和FGS两家为其伦敦首次公开募股（IPO）提供支持的通讯公司。【原文：Online fast-fashion retailer Shein has dropped Brunswick and FGS, two communications firms that were supporting its push for a London initial public offering (IPO), a source familiar with the matter confirmed on Friday, in the latest sign the flotation is not going to plan.】

item.title: 美国又有 10 个采矿项目进入快速审批名单
item.description: 特朗普政府周五将另外 10 个美国采矿项目列入快速审批名单，旨在扩大全国的重要矿产生产。【原文：The Trump administration on Friday added 10 more U.S. mining projects to a fast-track permitting list aimed at expanding critical minerals production across the country.】

item.title: 联合利华将投资 4 亿美元在墨西哥新建工厂
item.description: 消费品公司联合利华周五表示，将投资 80 亿比索（4.0744 亿美元）在墨西哥北部新莱昂州新建一家工厂。【原文：Consumer goods company Unilever said on Friday that it will invest 8 billion pesos ($407.44 million) in a new factory in the northern Mexican state of Nuevo Leon.】

item.title: 法官定于 9 月审理谷歌广告技术补救措施案
item.description: 弗吉尼亚州亚历山大市的一名法官周五表示，谷歌将于 9 月 22 日接受审判，以决定采取何种补救措施恢复在线广告市场的竞争。【原文：Google will face a trial on September 22 to determine remedies that would restore competition to online advertising markets, a judge in Alexandria, Virginia said on Friday.】

item.title: 巴克莱、高盛预计美联储下一次降息将在 7 月发布就业报告后进行
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）和高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）周五表示，他们预计美国联邦储备委员会将在 7 月份发布一份强于预期的就业报告后进行下一次降息。【原文：Barclays and Goldman Sachs said on Friday that they were expecting the U.S. Federal Reserve to deliver the next interest rate cut in July, after a stronger-than-expected jobs report.】

item.title: 彭博社：中美贸易紧张局势阻碍邦吉与 Viterra 的合并
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周五援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道称，邦吉全球公司（Bunge Global）与嘉能可（Glencore）支持的维泰拉公司（Viterra）价值 340 亿美元的合并因中美贸易紧张局势而受阻。【原文：Bunge Global's $34 billion merger with Glencore-backed Viterra is being stalled by trade tensions between the U.S. and China, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 商用飞机需求推动美国 3 月份工厂订单增长
item.description: 受商用飞机需求提振，3 月份美国制成品新订单激增，但预计这一势头将在贸易紧张局势中逐渐减弱。【原文：New orders for U.S.-manufactured goods surged in March, boosted by demand for commercial aircraft, but the momentum was expected to fizzle amid trade tensions.】

item.title: 特朗普提议削减 1630 亿美元联邦预算
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府在一份声明中表示，建议明年削减1630亿美元的联邦支出，这将取消超过五分之一的非军事支出（不包括强制性项目）。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration proposed a $163 billion cut to federal spending next year, which would eliminate more than a fifth of the non-military spending excluding mandatory programs, it said in a statement.】

item.title: 2025 年利润预期下调后，布洛克公司股价暴跌
item.description: 周五，Block 公司股价下跌 22%，创下自 2023 年 11 月以来的最低点，此前这家支付公司下调了今年的利润预期。【原文：Block's shares fell 22% on Friday, hitting their lowest since November 2023 after the payments firm cut its profit forecast for the year.】

item.title: 美国联邦政府就业人数再次下降，DOGE 裁员堆积如山
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统和顾问埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）致力于大幅削减联邦工作人员，4月份美国政府工作人员的数量连续第四个月下降，非邮政部门的就业人数减少了8500人。【原文：The ranks of U.S. government workers fell for a fourth straight month in April with non-postal employment falling by 8,500 as President Donald Trump and adviser Elon Musk aim for drastic cuts in the federal workforce.】

item.title: 美国股票基金连续第三周出现资金外流
item.description: 由于担心美国贸易政策对经济增长和商业情绪的影响，截至4月30日，美国股票基金连续第三周出现资金外流。【原文：U.S. equity funds witnessed outflows for a third straight week through April 30, driven by worries over the impact of U.S. trade policies on economic growth and business sentiment.】

item.title: 消息人士称，DOGE 扩大了在华尔街监管机构的存在
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，总统顾问埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的政府效率部（DOGE）正在扩大其在美国证券交易委员会的存在，增加了第三名工作人员。【原文：Presidential adviser Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) is expanding its presence at the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission by adding a third staff member, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 分析师警告：旅游需求疲软，美国经济面临损失数十亿美元的风险
item.description: 分析师警告说，随着特朗普政府的贸易政策对消费者情绪造成影响，与旅游相关的公司盈利预测黯淡，表明旅游需求减弱，今年美国经济可能因此损失数十亿美元。【原文：Weakening travel demand, signaled by grim earnings forecasts of travel-related companies, may erase billions of dollars from the U.S. economy this year as the Trump administration's trade policy takes a toll on consumer sentiment, analysts have warned.】

item.title: 欧盟反垄断监管机构将于 6 月 10 日前就 SES 和 Intelsat 的交易做出决定
item.description: 根据欧盟委员会网站上的一份文件，欧盟反垄断监管机构将在 6 月 10 日前决定是否批准欧洲卫星公司 SES 以 31 亿欧元收购 Intelsat 的交易。【原文：EU antitrust regulators will decide by June 10 whether to clear European satellite company SES's 3.1 billion euro acquisition of Intelsat, according to a filing on the European Commission website.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国经济处于 "转型期"，敦促美联储降息
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，美国经济正处于转型阶段，他列举了强劲的就业和他的关税计划，同时再次呼吁美国联邦储备委员会降低利率。【原文：President Donald Trump on Friday said the U.S. economy is in a transition stage, citing strong employment and his tariff plan while reiterating his call for the U.S. Federal Reserve to lower its interest rate.】

item.title: 就业市场依然稳定，美联储没有理由急于降息
item.description: 周五，美联储政策制定者对劳动力市场可能出现的裂痕保持警惕，因为企业正在适应唐纳德-特朗普总统反复无常的贸易政策，他们得到了一些保证：到目前为止，劳动力市场几乎没有疲软，没有理由急于降息。【原文：Federal Reserve policymakers on the alert for possible cracks in the labor market as businesses adjust to President Donald Trump's erratic trade policy got some reassurance on Friday that so far there's little weakness, and no reason to rush on rate cuts.】

item.title: 投资者抢购欧洲股票基金，但连续第三周逃离美国基金
item.description: 在截至4月30日的一周里，欧洲股票基金吸引了一年多来最大的单周资金流入，而美国基金则因关税对全球经济增长影响的持续不确定性而连续第三周出现资金流出。【原文：European equity funds attracted the largest weekly inflow in over a year in the week ending April 30, while U.S. funds saw outflows for a third straight week on continued uncertainty around the impact of tariffs on global economic growth.】

item.title: 英国将根据新制度禁止消费者借贷购买加密货币
item.description: 英国监管机构周五表示，英国将限制消费者使用信用卡购买加密货币，并限制他们使用加密货币借贷产品，此举旨在加强对加密资产的保护，因为这是英国首次对加密资产进行监管。【原文：Britain is to restrict consumers' use of credit cards to buy crypto and their access to crypto lending products, the regulator said on Friday, a move aimed at improving protection as cryptoassets are regulated for the first time.】

item.title: 在需求和贸易压力下，通用汽车将减少加拿大卡车组装厂的班次
item.description: 通用汽车公司和代表工人的工会周五表示，由于需求疲软和与贸易有关的挑战，通用汽车公司位于加拿大的奥沙瓦组装厂将从三班倒缩减为两班倒，该厂主要生产皮卡。【原文：General Motors' Oshawa Assembly plant in Canada, which builds pickup trucks, will cut back to a two-shift schedule from three due to softening demand and trade-related challenges, the company and the union representing workers said on Friday.】
